channel.title: Blob on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Blob on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Download Blob
item.description: An example of example of how to download a blob object in JavaScript. var a = document.createElement('a'); document.body.appendChild(a); a.style.display = 'none'; var blob = new Blob([audio], {type: 'audio/mpeg'}); var url = window.URL.createObjectURL(blob); a.href = url; a.download = 'file.mp3'; a.click(); window.URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
